thread.section_title: CarTrawler Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of CarTrawler | www.cartrawler.com
thread.title: Dave W

author: Dave W
title: Dave W
text: We used Cartrawler to find the right car at the right price from Goldcar. We got a Hyundai I30 which coped well with three adults and luggage. We had several trips around Lanzarote through the mountains and again it coped. Service on collection and return were excellent from the desk in the main terminal building. Life would be easier if the Spanish Car hire companies didn't hold the excess on your credit card (and take a while to refund it) or want to charge you extra for the privilege of not holding it! (Never had the same thing in Greece from the same car hire companies)
